website_summaries.verdict: Foldable aluminum alloy framed trike weighs just 30.9 pounds and fits easily in the trunk of most vehicles. Ideal for short trips.
pros: Despite its diminutive size, the 3-speed gearbox gives a top speed of almost 14 miles per hour
cons: 220-pound carrying capacity is impressive for a small trike but too low for some
Stability is an issue when cornering

customer_reviews.title: Gave me my legs back
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed! Took to Disney- worked well. I ride it all of the time. I’m 60 and 5’10 and it’s fine. You must get the ES 30- has a wider wheel base and a key start so you can take on plane. I also got the better seat on Amazon. It attracts attention so have little handouts w the name. Update: after riding it I decided to have the handle bars and seat raised- more comfortable for tall people
customer_reviews.author: kelbel

customer_reviews.title: It is the coolest!
customer_reviews.text: I am handy caped due to a virus, so I chose not to drive a car. I have been looking for something to give me the abelite to go out on my own and this is the answer. I found a lot of cool items at Amozon to addon the bike and it is the coolest ride. I feel great riding the trike and you will too.
customer_reviews.author: Popoff

customer_reviews.title: WORKED SO WELL!!
customer_reviews.text: This scooter is absolutely AMAZING!! Took it to Memorial Stadium for the Husker game! What a life saver it was!! It went up the small inclines without skipping a beat! It couldn’t make it up the stadium ramps (I knew they were too steep), but my husband pushed me up! The scooter folds like a stroller & was small enough to put between my legs in the stadium!! We all know how limited you are at a football game!! I’m 5ft 9 & weigh 180lbs. I can’t count all the compliments I received on this sharp scooter! If u need assistance getting around... this scooter is for u!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great product. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 71 year old man with balancing issues. I can't walk very well, but the es30 solved these problems. It is fast with a long battery life. It is easy to fold and fits in in a back seat or trunk. It easily replaces a wheel chair. It is actually fun to use by anyone who has tried it. I am a big man but seems to take the weight well. Topmate seems to be a good reliable company.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase in the last 5 years!!! Great for Travelers
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure how good it would be and I am happy to report this is the first product I’m taking the time to write a review. It is FANTASTIC!! I took on the plane to the CES convention in Las Vegas... i was able to get through tight spaces, road around sharp corners with no problem.... The only problem I would say is I was constantly stopped by everyone asking where they could buy one. I must’ve demoed how to fold it up and unfold it about 30 times. This is by far my best purchase of the last 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pre wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that it is 3 wheels for balance and can act as an aid for someone who has trouble walking long distance, it can fold small and be placed in a small space for storage or roll along with you.
customer_reviews.author: Penpat7

customer_reviews.title: Very wobbly scooter.
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was a.great idea but I think amateur engineers designed it. It.is very unstable/wobbly. Tho I didnt falling was not comfortable.even riding it in the house. The tires left black Mark's on my flooring. Additionally, they have had the return per ups tracking and have done nothing about any refund.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita L. Signs

customer_reviews.title: Not good for older adults
customer_reviews.text: Not stable would fall off turning isn’t easy specially making turns And it is heavy Feet bars to small
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: we are buying another
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it to cruise around the neighborhood. walk the dog......he even added drink holder
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great .. very lightweight and easy to fold.. I updated the seat with a back for support.
customer_reviews.author: Seyana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Trike
customer_reviews.text: This trike is narrow enough to get into closets and bathrooms. Works great indoors, especially for amputees.
customer_reviews.author: Lid

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and exactly as advertised. Easy to ride and wider rear axle make it easier to balance.
customer_reviews.author: steve E.

customer_reviews.title: Speedy and easy to fold
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and speedy! Airline will let you valet. Unsteady on tight turns. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Livingston

customer_reviews.title: WOW! At first, it exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Very unstable, difficult to make turns. No assembly required, packaging protected the product during shipping. The top speed is very fast, I'll stick with first speed until I gain more confidence. This is a quality product. Not able to ride this with any confidence, tried for a week and it still feels unstable. I’ve almost fallen several times. Plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick P Davis

customer_reviews.title: Parts for owners in the USA?
customer_reviews.text: Bought one 10/15/19, Nice... Pulled the batt using the web video on the Topmate web page. Put it into a bike bag on the front and ran the wiring out the power point hole. Now to get a spare JRTG-10S3P 36V 7.5 270Wh battery. The Web page for Topmate is good (lots of how too videos for replacing stuff). BUT the cart/purchase page wont let the USA be listed with your address for buying replacement parts. (throttle/batt/controller, etc). So,,,, HOW do I get another Battery on their site? Whats "wrong" with allowing customers in the USA to buy parts? I have a plug in/unplug setup but cant get a spare battery.... Why? Italy and UK can but not USA?
customer_reviews.author: Joan Chavez-Lee

customer_reviews.title: hard to ride , unsable
customer_reviews.text: this Ebike is uncomfortable , unstable , yard to open and close , too small for adult man .
customer_reviews.author: Saeed Masjedi

product_meta.title: TopMate ES30 Electric Scooter Mini Tricycle, Key Switch 3 Gears, Rear Axle 12.6 Inch, for Mobility Assistance and Travel
feature_bullets: 【Added Rear Axle Shock Absorption】A shock-absorbing module is added to the rear axle to make riding more stable，powerful and safe. The whole vehicle quality is only 14.5kg(32lb), but the carrying capacity reaches 100kg(220.5lb).

【Recommendation】It is recommended that people under the height of 5.9 feet and under 80 years old use this electric scooter. Driving electric scooter requires basic balancing capabilities. Please read the scooter parameters of the Product Description carefully, then refer to your physical condition, height and weight data for purchase.
【Adjustable Three Gear Speed】The first gear speed up to 3.7mile/h;The second speed up to 7.4mile/h;The third speed up to 13mile/h.You can adjust the speed freely.

【Key Switch & Durable Battery】ES30 Scooter has key switch that you can turn off the battery physically. Built in 18650 power lithium battery, power is 270W, charging duration of 3-4.5 hours, battery endurance of 25-30 km (15.53-18.64 miles), is the best choice for short trips.

【1 Year Warranty Service】If the electric tricycle has any quality problem, you can return the tricycle within 30 days after receiving it （Please return all accessories and ensure that the tricycle is not damaged). We also provide one year warranty service, if you have any questions, please contact us at any time, we will make solution for you.
